name: BitFight: Defense
description:
Test your clicking skills by defending your village from 12 waves of raiders!

There are three attack lanes that the enemies come from, choose wisely which lane you send your troops down, plan out unit orders and much more!

Send troops through the enemies spawning point to take lives from the enemies, get that to zero and you win! 

Your Unit Selection - 

Knight - Balanced, cheap

Brute - Slow, high damage and high armor

Archer - Attacks from far away, low armor, high damage, expensive.
